title: "Pokémon Decompiled"
skillsList: [ "C", "C++", "Game Boy Advance Architecture", "GitHub Actions (Caching/CI)" ]
url: "https://github.com/Michelleeby/pokeemerald/tree/trunk"
sortOrder: 1
---

My modded version of Pokémon Emerald, written in C. Original mods include a day/night cycle, a new PC access from the PokéNav, and many developed mods from others, like alterations to the DexNav to allow access from the PokéNav.
